text: Drechslera is a genus of fungi. Many of the species in this genus are plant pathogens. == Species == The following species are accepted within Drechslera:Drechslera S.Ito in GBIF Secretariat (2017). GBIF Backbone Taxonomy. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei accessed via https://www.gbif.org/species/2587966 on 2018-08-02. *Drechslera andersenii A.Lam *Drechslera apii (Göbelez) M.J.Richardson & E.M.Fraser *Drechslera arizonica (R.Sprague) Subram. & B.L.Jain *Drechslera avenacea (M.A.Curtis ex Cooke) Shoemaker *Drechslera avenicola B.D.Sun & T.Y.Zhang *Drechslera boeremae A.S.Patil & V.G.Rao *Drechslera campanulata (Lév.)
